Module io.github.mmm.value.observable
Package io.github.mmm.value.observable

Interface ChangeAwareObservableEventListener<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of observed value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener<ObservableEvent<V>>, ObservableEventListener<V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChangeAwareListEventListener<E>, ChangeAwareMapEventListener<K,​V>, ChangeAwareSetEventListener<E>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ChangeAwareObservableEventListener<V>
extends ObservableEventListener<V>
    ObservableEventListener that is also interested in changes. For performance optimization change events are only created and sent if at least one ChangeAwareObservableEventListener is registered.
    Please note that it is pointless to register a ChangeAwareObservableEventListener on an ObservableValue if the value type is immutable (such as String, Boolean, Number, Temporal, etc.). This only makes sense for types such as ObservableContainerValue.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.mmm.event.EventListener

        isMatchedUsingEquals, onEvent
